name: Trophic adventure
description:
Trophic adventure is a funny educational game in which you will learn the functioning of the food chain in nature, playing in 7 different ecosystems: Forest, Taiga, Desert, Savannah, Jungle, Meadow and Ocean.
In the forest, the eagle feeds on the rabbit, who feeds on the carrot, who feeds on the rain. Over time, they lose life they recover when they feed.
You have to keep the ecosystem balanced or soon the eagle, the rabbit or the carrot will run out of food and die.
It is also ideal for children, who learn while having fun. A good idea to have it installed for your children or your nephews to play.
